alert.note: Alert for George (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 16 at 4:44PM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Mobile and southeastern George Counties through 615 PM CDT... At 444 PM CDT, National Weather Service doppler radar indicated a strong thunderstorm over Semmes, or 10 miles west of Chickasaw, moving south at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Midtown Mobile, Prichard, Tillmans Corner, Saraland, Theodore, Chickasaw, Satsuma, Grand Bay, Bayou La Batre, Semmes, Tanner Williams, I65 And I165, Coden, Mobile Regional Airport, Wilmer, I65 And AL 158 and I10 And I65. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
